entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 13 April 2023
